pageContext.collection_title: Hupka, Robert. Robert Hupka Collection of Toscanini Test Pressings.
pageContext.collection_description: The 3608 Toscanini recordings include test pressings of Toscanini conducting the NBC Symphony Orchestra in concerts, as well as NBC broadcasts of operas, festival performances, sacred music and more, including rehearsals; for many of these, the location and date of the recording is given and in some cases additional information such as names of performers. Broadcasts took place in the 1930s and 40s.
pageContext.extent: 3608 recordings (747 tapes, unknown number of lacquer discs)
